attributes.action: not attend the Rugby World Cup Final as it is the English team playing NOT Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our "unelected Scottish" Prime Minister should NOT take advantage of a freebie invitation to support England at the Rugby World Cup final, when he uses the Scottish contigent of Labour MPs to impose legislation on the English

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
